程序包 foop.serialization

类 MessageFactory

java.lang.Object
foop.serialization.MessageFactory
public class MessageFactory extends Object
Factory to create deserialized and serialized messages
版本:
1.1 update the addition decode message packet size (small)
作者:
Maiqi Hou

  • 构造器详细资料

    • MessageFactory

      public MessageFactory()

  • 方法详细资料

    • decode

      public static Message decode​(byte[] pkt)
      Constructs message through deserialization
      参数:
      pkt - buffer containing bytes a single message
      返回:
      new deserialization message(Error, ACK, Register, and Addition)
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - if packet is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation failure, such invalid message value, packet size problem

    • encode

      public static byte[] encode​(Message msg)
      Serializes message(ACK, Register, Error, Addition)
      参数:
      msg - message to serialize
      返回:
      serialized byte array

    • registerMsg

      public static Register registerMsg​(byte[] pkt, int msgID)
      Decode message for Register type
      参数:
      pkt - message packet will be decoded
      msgID - message ID
      返回:
      a new register

    • additionMsg

      public static Addition additionMsg​(byte[] pkt, int msgID)
      Decode message for Addition type
      参数:
      pkt - message packet will be decoded
      msgID - message ID
      返回:
      a new addition message

    • errorMsg

      public static Error errorMsg​(byte[] pkt, int msgID)
      Decode message for Error type
      参数:
      pkt - message packet will be decoded
      msgID - message ID
      返回:
      a new error message

    • ackMsg

      public static ACK ackMsg​(byte[] pkt, int msgID)
      Decode message for ACK type
      参数:
      pkt - message packet will be decode
      msgID - message ID
      返回:
      a new ACK message

    • checkCode

      public static void checkCode​(int code)
      Check Message code whether valid
      参数:
      code - Message code(ACK, Register, Addition, Error)

    • high4

      public static int high4​(byte b)
      Get the Message version
      参数:
      b - first byte on the message packet
      返回:
      the message version

    • low4

      public static int low4​(byte b)
      Get the message code
      参数:
      b - first byte on the message packet
      返回:
      the message code

    • convert8bitToInt

      public static int convert8bitToInt​(byte b)
      Convert 8 unsigned bit to the Message ID/ calories(addition)
      参数:
      b - the byte for message ID or calories
      返回:
      the value of Message ID or calories

    • convert16bitToInt

      public static int convert16bitToInt​(byte[] b)
      Convert 16 bit unsigned bit to the Register port
      参数:
      b - the bytes for Register port(little endian)
      返回:
      the register port
